title: Beer Cheese Recipe
full_text:
Beer Cheese Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Cook
10 mins
Active
10 mins
Total
15 mins
Serves
12 servings
Makes
3 cups
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
12
ounces
sharp cheddar cheese
, shredded
1 1/2
tablespoons
cornstarch
1
(
12-ounce
) bottle beer, preferably
brown ale
5
ounces
evaporated milk
1
tablespoon
Dijon mustard
1
teaspoon
Worcestershire sauce
1
teaspoon
hot sauce
Kosher salt
, to taste
Directions
Toss cheese with cornstarch in a medium bowl; set aside.
Serious Eats / Qi Ai
Whisk together beer, milk, mustard, and Worcestershire sauce in a medium saucepan. Heat over medium heat until gently steaming, whisking frequently to prevent scorching.
Serious Eats / Qi Ai
When beer mixture is warm, add cheese, stirring until completely melted, bubbling slightly, and thickened. Stir in hot sauce and season with salt to taste; serve immediately.
Serious Eats / Qi Ai
Special Equipment
Saucepan, whisk.
Cheese Dips
Cheddar Cheese
Game Day
